name: The eye of the Grand Sultan
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It decreases the users cold resistance adequately.
